title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. The current implementation on all motif platforms looks bad.
OB: The fields on the Info page are created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. It seems that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
EB: The fields on the Info page should be implemented as Labels instead of readonly Text fields. This will improve the visual appearance of the page on all motif platforms.
SR: To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right click and go to Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.). They are displayed as text fields instead of labels.
